entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Grand Bank
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 11:30 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: 25 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then northeast 60 gusting to 80 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then clearing. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023
